content.title: About Us
content.paragraph1: Here at Mogul Management we specialize in real estate and credit repair. Our team focuses on wholesaling where we find discounted properties for investors anywhere in the Massachusetts area. We look for a win win scenario where we can help the seller and the end buyer both meet their needs so that everyone walks away from the closing table satisfied. Our credit repair department is outstanding and helps our clients not only build their credit but will coach you along the way. For those that apply for our credit repair program, even after you reach your target goal you will have life time access to one of our coaches if you ever have any questions regarding your credit. Aside from wholesaling and credit repair, we partner with a couple vendors that have services such as web designing, hard money lending and tax preparation. If you are in need of any of these services please give us a call and we will direct you to those departments.
